me.philio.pinentry

Class PinEntryView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • me.philio.pinentry.PinEntryView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent

    public class PinEntryView
extends android.view.ViewGroup
    A PIN entry view widget for Android based on the Android 5 Material Theme via the AppCompat v7 support library.

      • onPinEnteredListener

        private PinEntryView.OnPinEnteredListener onPinEnteredListener
        Pin entered listener used as a callback for when all digits have been entered

      • accentRequiresFocus

        private boolean accentRequiresFocus
        If set to false, will always draw accent color if type is CHARACTER or ALL If set to true, will draw accent color only when focussed.
